Before the Blackfeather could do anything, the bombs exploded. The
five troopers were blasted to slag in a matter of nanocycles, but it
was the destruction of the plant that damaged most of the ship. Debris
came hurtling at it and the shields could not hold all the damages. It
tipped with the gravity force and reentered atmosphere.

In Silver Wing Command, Razorwing was not pleased.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Darkfate/Nightstrike:
> 
> "Time to left the planet???" asked cooly Darkfate
> 
> "Time to left the Planet... release the gift 98"Said Nightstrike
> 
> "My favorite"said the male while he took a spheric black device, he
mockly showed the bomb knowking that BlackFeather's crew could  scan
it. the bost ran towards the Space. B ut before they reach the earlies
Atmosphere's layers Darkfate release one bomb towards the factory's
center and Nightstrike releaqse other ones towards the bunkers where
the worker-bots might seek-refuge.
> 
> 
> ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

>   Subject: Re: Red alert in low orbit (Minions on action)
> 
> 
>   The Blackfeather was in safe range of the orbital plant. The commander
>   ordered the exit of a heavily armed squad that would be able to offer
>   a more directed support to bring down the two attackers.
> 
>   The five-crew squad was soon out, guns blazing, sending energy bolts
>   at the Minions.
